name: Super Ninja Panda Bamboo Country Escape: Kung Fu Jump Saga
name_original: Super Ninja Panda Bamboo Country Escape: Kung Fu Jump Saga
description:
*This is the MOST adventurous, high flying game you'll ever play!!

*Travel to a far away land where Awesome Ninja Panda Rules ALL!!

*See How far you can fly with added boosters and power packs

* Collect coins to boost your score and unlock awesome power ups !!

* Leaderboard integrated

* 4 main characters to choose from

* Cool and entertaining music

* Don't forget to tell your FRIENDS how AWESOME this game is using the Facebook link!
